name: Scooby Doo
description: Scooby Doo (SODO) is a meme token which began as a fun currency and now has plans to transform into a decentralized gaming ecosystem. Scooby Doo is a cryptocurrency that was created on May 7th, 2023 and is based on the popular "Scooby Doo" Internet meme and features the Great Dane on its logo. The project is based on the Ethereum chain due to its popularity and standard but the team has plans to eventually integrate on other chains as the project grows and gaming implementation takes place. Short term the project plans to launch its platform and begin onboarding users. In the long term, the project plans to expand its platform and offer a wide range of gaming and financial services.
